pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, February 8, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Member of Parliament for Toronto Centre Marci Ien, will virtually visit Black Owned Toronto and Fara Coffee Roasters, two small businesses in Mississauga, and Toronto, Ontario.

Closed to media.
